translations: （身体）柔软的，灵活的；易弯曲的，柔韧的；逢迎的；顺从的

sentences.sentence: Paul was incredibly supple and strong.
These exercises will help to keep you supple.
sentences.translation: 这些锻炼项目有助于你保持身体的柔韧性。

sentences.sentence: This mask leaves your complexion feeling soft and supple.
sentences.translation: 这种面膜使你的皮肤变得柔软娇嫩。
